description.value: At 20th level, you and the machines within you become one. Your nanites consume and replicate your body, allowing swift and radical physical alterations with little more than a thought. You become immune to bleed effects, diseases, and poisons, and gain DR 5/â€”. At will, you can break down your body and move in a shimmering stream of flying nanites, as if affected by @Compendium[pf1.spells.mqdoexj35atgqafn]{Gaseous Form}.
